name: KohimaNewsinNagamese
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: News in Nagamese for Kohima and the surrounding regions from All India Radio. This requires no configuration. This is the first News Service in Nagamese from Kohima for Indians on Intelligent (AI enabled) Speaker platform.
